trends: There have been no other sightings in Aliquippa
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: sighting detailsthis is the second time i saw this same object at the same area except this time i had a newer phone and was able to capture three images... was on my porch talking on the phone looked up and saw this this again.. hung up phone and took photos.. this object made no sound whatsoever and i live les than twelve miles from pittsburgh international airport so i know airplanes and helicopters even blimps.. this was not any of those.. i've seen another type of unknown thing but i wouldn't be able to describe it by writing.. it was so strange i'd have to explain but this is the one that i have proof of. i am always looking in the sky.. i'm fascinated by the unknown but i'm not over zealous and certainly not a whacko :-). you have to zoom in really close to see the light but that's because i don't know how to use the zoom on my phone camera.. the photo with the building in it.. the light is above and to the left but once you zoom in you can't miss it.. on all three photos.. plz let me know what you think.. hope i've contributed something useful. thank you for your time [name removed\cms\tg]
